factory

类 Maze00

  • java.lang.Object
    • factory.Maze
      • factory.Maze00
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Drawable

    public class Maze00
extends Maze
    Class Maze00 represents a concrete map in the pacman game

    provided by HashSet, Set, Group, Color.

    Class Maze specifies the details of a concrete maze in the pacman game. See sample.drawable. A maze should specify the position of obstacles in a two-dimensional array. A maze should be customizable with its color of obstacles by customize A maze should implement all functions provided in the interface sample.Drawable.

    版本:
    1.03
    作者:
    Boon Giin Lee, Heng Yu, Chen Liao
